page.title: 13RELIGION
page.content:
INTERVIEW WITH ARCH DEACON SIMPSON. What isthe name of your church? St. James the Great, Gawsworth. How long have you been at the church? Seven years. Is your job a busy one? Yes. What type of service is your favourite? The Communion Service. When you go on hloiday who takes over? Who ever is .available. Which part of the Church's year is your favourite? It must be Christmas. Why did you choose to be in the church? I always wanted to be as far back as I can remember.
Interview by Barbra Farrish.
